title: LIGHTNING RETURNS FFXIII
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Spanish.  Lightning, the star of the FINAL FANTASY XIII series, is poised to face her ultimate challenge. Experience a new game world, a new battle system, and extended customization features. The epic FINAL FANTASY XIII tale is coming to a thrilling finale, but every facet of the game has been revamped to deliver an original gaming experience. The world will end in 13 days. Once again, its fate rests on the shoulders of one woman.

childDownloads.title: Art of War
childDownloads.description: A Luxerion-ready schema of Art of War, Cruel Grace, and Warning Sign, set with bold finishing moves and magic resistance.  Schemata can be obtained in the main menu's Rewards Barter Shop after completing the tutorial. If you modify the equipment, you can use gil to buy the original item again.

childDownloads.title: Cactuar
childDownloads.description: Obtain the infamous cactuar!

childDownloads.title: Caius Ballard Gear
childDownloads.description: Equip your Avatar as the villanous Caius Ballard!

childDownloads.title: Dark Samurai
childDownloads.description: A Luxerion-ready schema of Dark Samurai, Cloud Veil, and Nightwalker, with strong finishing moves and physical resistance.  Schemata can be obtained in the main menu's Rewards Barter Shop after completing the tutorial. If you modify the equipment, you can use gil to buy the original item again.

childDownloads.title: Divine Wear
childDownloads.description: A schema of Cosmocrator, Crocea Mors, Abyss Gate, and Deathless Mask, with godly power and the exclusive ability Cosmic Arts.  Schemata can be obtained in the main menu's Rewards Barter Shop after completing the tutorial. If you modify the equipment, you can use gil to buy the original item again.

childDownloads.title: FF LEGENDS Collection
childDownloads.description: A bundle of 3 schemata for LR: FFXIII. This nostalgic pack includes FFVII Cloud, FFVII Aerith, and FFX-2 Yuna.  Schemata can be obtained in the main menu's Rewards Barter Shop after completing the tutorial. If you modify the equipment, you can use gil to buy the original item again.

childDownloads.title: FFVII Aerith
childDownloads.description: A schema of Midgar's Flower Girl, Guard Stick, and Flower Bearer, with restorative magic and a powerful Mediguard ability.  Schemata can be obtained in the main menu's Rewards Barter Shop after completing the tutorial. If you modify the equipment, you can use gil to buy the original item again.

childDownloads.title: FFVII Cloud
childDownloads.description: A schema of SOLDIER 1st Class, Buster Sword, and SOLDIER's Band, able to unleash Slayer under the right conditions.  Schemata can be obtained in the main menu's Rewards Barter Shop after completing the tutorial. If you modify the equipment, you can use gil to buy the original item again.

childDownloads.title: FFX Yuna
childDownloads.description: A schema of Spira's Summoner, Summoner's Staff, and Summoner's Shield, set with Elementa and able to cast magic with speed.  Schemata can be obtained in the main menu's Rewards Barter Shop after completing the tutorial. If you modify the equipment, you can use gil to buy the original item again.

childDownloads.title: FFX-2 Yuna
childDownloads.description: A schema of Sphere Hunter, Brotherhood, and Guardian's Protector, able to deliver Crashing Waves area attacks.  Schemata can be obtained in the main menu's Rewards Barter Shop after completing the tutorial. If you modify the equipment, you can use gil to buy the original item again.

childDownloads.title: Japanese Voice Pack
childDownloads.description: Enjoy LIGHTNING RETURNS: FINAL FANTASY XIII with Japanese voices.  To switch the voice language, go to the main menu and select Settings, and then Voice.

childDownloads.title: LRFF13 (Demo ver.)
childDownloads.description: This is the LRFFXIII playable demo. The last of the FINAL FANTASY XIII trilogy, this installment offers a brand-new battle feature with lots of customization options. Don't forget to activate Outerworld services and submit your battle score to receive the garb Siegfried that can be used in LRFFXIII.
